title: Why is this okay?
body:
I am thinking about quitting league.

I just left a ranked game with a Shyvanna player that BM'ed me grievously. He engaged in the use of language such as "dumb ass" and "go fuck yourself" without any just cause. Shyvanna went into enemy jgl, i pinged the MIA mid immediately, yet Shyv did not back off and died to them converging on her; I was too low to follow without getting one shot from a bush.

I was carrying either way. After the harassment began (and proceeded into all chat), i no longer wanted to carry anymore. i didnt not feel like playing. this use of language was further supported by a Trynd player. The trynd proceeded to call me a "privileged sensitive bitch".

I was triggered. I do not feel it is appropriate to share my personal information on the internet but i was the victim of a long term sexually and verbally abusive situation in my childhood. 

I was triggered.

I am still triggered.

Use of that language had no purpose in that game. it had no purpose in league. I do not understand how behavior like this is acceptable by anyone. I was hoping to make it to gold before the season ended; i do not think i will be playing again anytime soon.

Riot, that wasn't toxic; it was triggering. It is enabling to dismiss that with a warning. I felt myself wanting to cry during the game.

The profound shock of it continuing in all chat made me want to D/C. i felt bad for the bot lane i was playing with. but engaging teammates in such a way is unhealthy.

No one deserves to be treated in such a way. it happening on the internet does not give anyone the excuse. real friends are made here. real feelings are hurt.

**EDIT:** Reposting the blog because i do not know why it was taken down. I took the names out (against my better judgment -- destructively harmful/negative behavior should always be ostracized), and took cuss words out of the title.

A moderator suggested i report the players. that is all. sigh. Why can we not reply to the messages they send us?

is it even possible to report anyone outside of the end of game window? I would like to do that, if possible.

replies.body:
> Use of that language had no purpose in that game. it had no purpose in league. I do not understand how behavior like this is acceptable by anyone.

You're right, but we have the tools to deal with verbal abuse. If someone is being a jerk like that, simply mute them. They obviously don't want to use chat for anything useful, or are at least doing more harm than good, so they can just rely on pings to communicate. When the game is over you can report them, and a report for this kind of behavior is certainly a punishable offense, so if they do this frequently and are consistently reported they will get their punishment so that you can help prevent other players from dealing with it.

Basically, don't hesitate to mute them, and report if you feel it necessary.

As for calling them out on the boards, starting a witch hunt does not solve the problem, it just creates drama. Leave it to Riot to handle these players. We can sympathize with your situation and give advice, but that's it.

how do i report after the end of game chat? 

Part of me posting is related to the toxicity of the community as a whole. Look at the poll; what ever disgusting individual had the nerve to click the third option, this post is about you.
You can submit a ticket, but that is not necessary and Riot may not have the time to review a single case of someone being a dick. If anyone reported this person, then that is enough.

> how do i report after the end of game chat? 
> 
> Part of me posting is related to the toxicity of the community as a whole. Look at the poll; what ever disgusting individual had the nerve to click the third option, this post is about you.

In the right of their names there is a ! sign, click it then select the categories then click report, you can also write a summary about what happened.

I'm sorry you had to deal with scum like that.
Those who think they can trash-talk people because they think they're "tough" or get mad are everywhere.
Why is it okay for people to leave games? I don't know. Don't be scum, be better than them.

I dont want to sound rude, but topic like this is just making my head shake. In what way do you think everyone thinks this is ok? There are some people who are horrible and act like this TC. Just like in real life. No one should be having this happen to them, but it is near impossible to stop. Let alone the fact that normal people do not find what you had encounter as "Ok". it would be like saying since people steal and dont get caught means everyone is ok with stealing. its wrong.

All in all just as everyone said in the replies, just mute the person and report them if its that bad. it will get them punished, maybe not right then and there. But as long as they continue they will get caught. This has never and will never be an acceptable behavior, so as someone who is passionate it would be wise not to group us with people who break the rules.

there is currently a thread about a player, started by the player, laughing in riots face about being banned and discussing buying accounts.

it is still up and open.

my questions are more directed at riot, not the player base.

i also understand that "us" is 1/3 in favor of me ceasing to be a bitch. that's a large portion of "you".

The discussion of "belittling shyvanna's mid" continued in all chat, i never said i didnt mute the players.

I also reported both players in end of game chat; I personally am indifferent to Riot's end of game chat report system because i have never received any verification that it works. I have only been asking about a secondary way to report.

I should state that you have no clue what my day to day may be like. What can be perceived as possibly being accepted by a community can be different depending on the individual.

In all honesty its why I now avoid rank and some of my friends want me to supp them. People are being to toxic and they have no right to be. Its a game. and you or someone else maybe having a bad game. If they are that bad ALWAYS ALWAYS submit a ticket. Alot of what people say in chat Riot wont stand for. Like {{champion:21}}  says fortune doesn't favour fools. Or toxic people. Oh and take screen shots when you can to attach to the ticket
no one cares if you wont be playing then if you cant press the mute button

/ignore @shyvana, silently report postgame. Trash will get banned eventually.

Welcome to league. If your skin is this thing, i suggest you play difficult subscription MMOs, as they tend to be relatively scum-free.
